column4: ok, I had to disable my onboard sound to get past the loading hotplug subsystem. But now, after a while, it gets boring wothout sound. Is there any1 who knows how to fix it so that I can have my sound back?
likely hotplug is loading the wrong driver. You might need to blacklist a certain driver to get it to work
: Do you know how to do that?
sorry, no. I would google the make of your soundcard and ubuntu and see if you get a hit
